applicationProcess.description: Steps required to complete the bus service application process

steps.title: Fill Application Form
steps.desc: Enter your personal, academic, and route details carefully. This information is used for service allocation and verification.

steps.title: Payment & Evidence
steps.desc: Pay the bus fee online or offline. Online payments are verified automatically, while offline payments require receipt details.

steps.title: Moderator Verification
steps.desc: If you paid offline, visit the Bus Office with valid proof. The managing team will verify and issue a 6-digit code. Otherwise, for online payments just submit.

steps.title: Enter Verification Code (For offline payments)
steps.desc: Enter the provided 6-digit code to confirm offline payment. The submit option activates after successful verification.

steps.title: Final Approval & Activation
steps.desc: After review, your application is approved and bus services are activated. This may take 2-3 business days. Get instant notification!

importantNotes.text: Supports both Online and Offline Payment. Chose anyone as per your convinience.
Proper system verification required before you could submit the application form.
Session Validity: Bus passes are valid for full academic years and must renewed in the month of July.
Renewal Reminders: You'll receive automate reminders in June before your pass expires.
Processing Time: Applications are typically processed within 2-3 business days after submission.
